snippet: With tears streaming down his face after being kneed in the back, Neymar was carried off the field on a stretcher....

headline.print_headline: Brazil Striker Neymar to Miss Rest of World Cup
headline.main: Brazil Striker Neymar to Miss Rest of World Cup

lead_paragraph: With tears streaming down his face after being kneed in the back, Neymar was carried off the field on a stretcher.
